metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1751 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability was found in glibc before 2.31 when handling signal trampolines on PowerPC. Specifically, the backtrace function did not properly check the array bounds when storing the frame address, resulting in a denial of service or potential code execution. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

notes.Note: leosilva> -esm releases only supports amd64 arch mdeslaur> introduced in https://sourceware.org/git/?p=glibc.git;a=commit;h=d400dcac5e

criterions.comment: eglibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'out of support').
